## EthersMosaicConnection interface

Information about a connection to the Mosaic protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EthersMosaicConnection extends EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [EthersMosaicConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnectionoptionalparams.md)

## Remarks

Provided for debugging / informational purposes.

Exposed through [ReadableEthersMosaic.connection](./lib-ethers.readableethersmosaic.connection.md) and [EthersMosaic.connection](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaic.connection.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addresses](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.addresses.md) | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | A mapping of Mosaic contracts' names to their addresses. |
|  [bootstrapPeriod](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.bootstrapperiod.md) | number | Time period (in seconds) after <code>deploymentDate</code> during which redemptions are disabled. |
|  [chainId](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.chainid.md) | number | Chain ID of the connected network. |
|  [deploymentDate](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.deploymentdate.md) | Date | Date when the Mosaic contracts were deployed. |
|  [liquidityMiningMSICRewardRate](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.liquidityminingmsicrewardrate.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of MSIC collectively rewarded to stakers of the liquidity mining pool per second. |
|  [provider](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.provider.md) | [EthersProvider](./lib-ethers.ethersprovider.md) | Ethers <code>Provider</code> used for connecting to the network. |
|  [signer?](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.signer.md) | [EthersSigner](./lib-ethers.etherssigner.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Ethers <code>Signer</code> used for sending transactions. |
|  [startBlock](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.startblock.md) | number | Number of block in which the first Mosaic contract was deployed. |
|  [totalStabilityPoolMSICReward](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.totalstabilitypoolmsicreward.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Total amount of MSIC allocated for rewarding stability depositors. |
|  [version](./lib-ethers.ethersmosaicconnection.version.md) | string | Version of the Mosaic contracts (Git commit hash). |
